name: LawofAttraction
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Having awareness is the key to achieving whatever you want in life because awareness is the fire in which all the parts of your mind working against you will perish. Therefore, if you can learn to master your own personal awareness-then you will be able to make powerful conscious choices about your life that will bring you closer to what truly makes you happy. Our law of attraction series is designed to elevate you to a higher state of mental prowess by aligning you with the 7 natural laws of the universe.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
